overview:
Vatche (Vito) Klahejian is the owner of Arka Designs (arkadesigns.com) a Los Angeles based high-end online diamond jewelry store.

Arkadesigns.com has been operating online since 1997 and is one of the earliest online jewelery stores based in Los Angeles, California. Recently Arka Designs, under the direction of Mr. Klahejian, has started a geo-targeted approach to online jewelry sales and is aggressively building a brand reputation as a trustworthy local (greater Los Angeles area) online jeweler.

Mr. Klahejian is a master jeweler and a diamond appraiser by profession in addition to being the principal of a reputable online jeweler store. He oversees every individual transaction himself and is involved in every aspect of the operations of Arkadesigns.com.
